msbt.message: I do hope the fish feel comfortable here. It certainly appears Blathers made a lovely new home for them.
There are so many kinds of freshwater fishâ€”almost as many as saltwater fish. Little ones, big ones, plain ones, flashy ones What kind of fish do you like, ?
Watching fish swimming in crystal- clear waterit calms my mind and helps me relax, . In fact, I'm feeling so relaxed I think a nap might be in order.
The sound of bubbles pip-popping in this quiet space makes me feel as if I'm floating in the ocean.
The ocean is so vast, and yetit really does feel as if the whole thing has been captured in this space.
I find that being in this place clears my mind. It's as if the water washes away all my cares, . Oooh! Perhaps I was a fish in another life! I wonder if Blathers would let me live here? Tee-hee!
There are some fish who never seem to stop swimming. I wonderdo the poor things ever get tired? You know, if I could walk around without getting tired like that, I could get so much shopping done!
This place is so soothing that I completely lose track of time, .
I'd love to swim freely in the ocean like a fish and watch all my troubles float away
So you're visiting another island's exhibit. You must adore fish!<10_4 /> I do hope the fish here are to your liking.
I threw on some frumpy ol' clothes before coming here.Had I known we'd have a guest from another island, I'd have put on a much nicer outfit, !
I just felt like watching fish today. You know how it is. Relax and enjoy the view, .
Since this building was only just finished, all of the exhibits are absolutely pristine! I LOVE it! Yes indeed, this will make a very nice home for all the fish.
I was excited for the museum to open. ButI had no idea it would be so relaxing and cozy in here. Will I come here to see the fish or to take a nap? Perhaps a bit of both, .

Have you already been to the other exhibits, ?I think it's marvelous the way each room has its own unique theme.I don't know how I got so lucky as to live on an island with a museum as classy as this, !
